DOC.brief_summary: In Type 2 Diabetes mellitus patient : 1. quantify vasculopathy blood-retinal barrier ( BRB ) leakage 2. measure blood-brain barrier ( BBB ) permeability neuroanatomical change 3. correlate BRB pathology BBB breakdown , inflammatory marker neuropsychiatric sequela
DOC.brief_title: Blood-retinal Barrier Imaging Neuropsychiatric Sequela Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . T2DM Patient suffer NonProliferative Diabetic Retinopathy ( NPDR ) , Proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy ( PDR ) Diabetic Macular Edema ( DME ) clinical database ophthalmologic department , 18 year old time diagnosis underwent FA examination past three year 2 . Patients medical record available via computerize data base Control group : 1 . T2DM patient clinical database ophthalmologic department 2 . Above 18 year old time diagnosis 3 . Underwent FA examination past three year examination interpret `` normal '' , i.e . without suspect diabetic retinopathy
